channel.title: Why do they all need it
channel.description: why do all my friend need jdk to connect to my server but when they connect to others they dont?

item.title: Why do they all need it
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:2, topic:432251”]It could be in your run batch file. ^.^

Try putting jre6 or jre7 where the jdk version is, Idk. lol. You can also try converting it to a .exe[/quote]

Why the hell do you tell everyone to convert there batches to exes,
There is totally no point in doing that, it doesn’t change the code, it still executes the batch…

@OP
Convert it so it doesn’t need jdk in the run

Read full topic
item.source: Why do they all need it
